meanings.definition: Lovastatins: a group of drugs used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lovastatins to help reduce my cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Many people take lovastatins to manage their cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: I joked that lovastatins were like tiny cholesterol fighters in pill form.
meanings.sent4: Taking lovastatins is like having a team of cholesterol warriors in your bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The image of lovastatins battling cholesterol is quite powerful.
